org.afree.chart.renderer.xy

Class XYErrorRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.afree.chart.renderer.AbstractRenderer
      • org.afree.chart.renderer.xy.AbstractXYItemRenderer
        • org.afree.chart.renderer.xy.XYLineAndShapeRenderer
          • org.afree.chart.renderer.xy.XYErrorRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, LegendItemSource, XYItemRenderer

    public class XYErrorRenderer
extends XYLineAndShapeRenderer
    A line and shape renderer that can also display x and/or y-error values. This renderer expects an IntervalXYDataset, otherwise it reverts to the behaviour of the super class. The example shown here is generated by the XYErrorRendererDemo1.java program included in the AFreeChart demo collection:

    Since:
    JFreeChart 1.0.3
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getErrorPaintType

        public PaintType getErrorPaintType()
        Returns the paint used to draw the error bars. If this is null (the default), the item paint is used instead.
        Returns:
        The paint type (possibly null).
        See Also:
        setErrorPaintType(PaintType)

        See Also:
        getErrorPaintType()

      • getErrorStroke

        public float getErrorStroke()
        Returns the stroke used to draw the error bars. If this is null (the default), the item outline stroke is used instead.
        Returns:
        The stroke (possibly null).
        Since:
        JFreeChart 1.0.13
        See Also:
        setErrorStroke(float stroke)

        Specified by:
        drawItem in interface XYItemRenderer
        Overrides:

        Parameters:

        state - the renderer state.

        info - the plot rendering info.
        plot - the plot.
        domainAxis - the domain axis.
        rangeAxis - the range axis.
        dataset - the dataset.
        series - the series index.
        item - the item index.
